website_summaries.verdict: This ultra-popular knee pillow impresses the young and old alike with its multi-functionality and supreme comfort.
pros: Can be used for lumbar support and alignment
Thin design allows for comfortable sleeping position
cons: Heavier customers wished the pillow offered more support

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this production as it was recommended by Amazon. The delivery speed was excellent arriving 20 days earlier than expected. When I picked up the item I felt that it was going to be to light weight to support my legs. I weigh 93kg and my thighs squashed this flat like a pancake. I then used it under one leg, placing it under my calf muscle and immediately it went flat like an old bicycle tire. My wife who weighs 43kg, she used it between her thighs and it deflated like a party balloon. In my final analysis, this product is not fit for the recommended use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tolson

customer_reviews.title: Great concept. Poorly excucuted.
customer_reviews.text: It squished too flat for me and my knees are touching and drives me bonkers. Wish it had stayed a little bit more firm. So at the tops of my calves would stay separated, and my knees not touch. (Chiropractor recommended me having once since I’m a side sleeper who tosses and turns)
customer_reviews.author: IngridH

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy- Induced Sciatica relief!
customer_reviews.text: I'd tried a regular pillow, couch pillow, and body pillow. I'd begun to think that positioning wouldn't help, but this pillow helps a bunch! I can walk to the bathroom (50x/night) without wincing the whole way!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not great, Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I was going to love it but after using it a few nights I discovered it to go completely flat after having my knee on it for more than 20 minutes. Totally unhelpful with it being flat for me as I am a side sleeper who sleeps with my top knee kicked out in front of me. I was hoping this would work as good as my body pillow so I would not have to sleep with a big body pillow between my husband and myself.
customer_reviews.author: ABlack

customer_reviews.title: Complete relief of sciatica pain!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been suffering from sciatica pain for the past year. The pain would make sleeping difficult and was really bad when he got out of bed. He is currently going to physical therapy for it but has had very little relief. After one night using this knee pillow he had NO pain when he woke up! The pillow is firm enough to keep your knees separated yet the cover is very soft to the touch. Somehow it seems to move with you in your sleep without falling out of place. Amazing product! We were also impressed with how quickly we received the item.
customer_reviews.author: boogie pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Good at first... hours later, flat.
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper and had been using a regular pillow between the knees. This knee pillow feels great when I first lay down, but eventually it always compresses down to the point where my knees touch and it becomes uncomfortable. They state in the description. That it does not go flat, part of the reason I purchased this, but I am 5’11” 160 pounds, not big at all and it goes flat. Such high hopes for this pillow, a higher density foam should be used as this one clearly compresses once it warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Zach P

customer_reviews.title: His physical therapist recommended he put a pillow between his knees at night
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently had knee replacement surgery. His physical therapist recommended he put a pillow between his knees at night. Didn't work well.....so I saw an for your knee pillow and ordered two. My husband is doing better with his new pillow and I'm using one too because my hips bother me at night. They're a little cumbersome at first, but a couple of nights and we're getting used to them. You've made a couple of 86 year old seniors happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog gives it a 10/10
customer_reviews.text: My dog (@mahrli_theyorkie) gives it a 10/10. He says its the best sleep he's ever gotten. He can even watch his favorite shows on Netflix better thanks to this pillow! When he goes on walks he feels so much better. Btw, I am not single surprisingly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Product!!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this product and seller! I was in a serious auto accident a year and a half ago with knee and neck injuries. Nothing worked to help the knee pain at night while trying to sleep. Then I found this pillow! Amazing!! So impressed I purchased one for my daughter who was having back/hip/knee issues from running. She loves hers too! I am an RN so I am very picky about support/therapeutic devices. The cover of this pillow zips off for laundering. The pillow maintains its shape with continued use. Comes with a lifetime guarantee. Highly recommend. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these, one for myself and one for my husband. I ordered his a week or so after mine. They both are squished flat when in use and have lost all support! I would not buy this product or recommend this brand. My husband and I enjoyed them the first week or so but now after a few months, these are simply a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: I only got this pillow today, so I will update this review later on if need be.... I already have plans to get another one of these as a gift for someone this year. For those who are wondering if this pillow will compress pathetically between your legs, fear not. This is a nice, firm pillow that needs a good deal of pressure to compress to halway it's size. My pillow measures at a little more than 3 and a half inches at the narrowest point. For me, at least, that feels quite wide during use. I was concerned this pillow would feel like nothing, but it is very supportive. Very happy and excited to use this pillow. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dreyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for anyone with OA in the knees...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pillow based on the previous reviews and the reviews were right. This is a large pillow that comes inside of a washable cover. It fits my legs perfectly and holds my knees apart so that I can sleep comfortably. I have OA in my knees and finding a comfortable sleeping position is very hard. With this pillow is is very easy to get comfortable now. My knees don't touch which is the main reason why I could not get comfortable. Having my knees touch made the arthritis much more painful while I was laying down in bed. With this pillow, I no longer have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Romano

customer_reviews.title: Charge of 26.5% return shipping for the “privilege” of trying their New Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Amazon Prime. I sleep on my side and purchased it to keep my spine in alignment. The product did not work for me. I found that even minimal movement caused the product to slip out. When I went to return it within a week of purchase; I was flabbergasted that I would be charged $7.95 (26.5%) return shipping on a $29.99 product. Comfilife must not think very highly of their product to charge 26.5% for the “privilege” of trying their New Pillow!
customer_reviews.author: jan gorman

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: I am a 140 pound female and this pillow squishes down to nothing when sleeping on my side. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Find with Multiple Uses!
customer_reviews.text: Recently had reconstructive ankle surgery and needed something to aid in equal weight distribution of my hips and knees. This wedge has surprisingly been helpful in more ways than expected. The material is soft and of quality form, it doesn’t squeeze flat when weight applied. Happy with my investment!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Works SO much better than a pillow
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how well this worked. I flip from one side to another often and it is way less hassle using this than a standard pillow that I used to use. After airing it out a day it was good to go. It is nice and soft as well as supportive. My only regret is not purchasing this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is easily one of my worst purchases in almost a decade on Amazon. The pillow is just a cheap dense foam pad, covered in a cheap pillow cover that's two sizes too small. The foam shreds trying to get it back inside the way-too-small cover after taking it off for a wash, and the zipper cover will break trying to close (since it's too god damn small). I'd give this a zero if I could. I've barely had it for a week. I'd return it if it wasn't so badly damaged already.
customer_reviews.author: Blighter44

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is much superior to another supposed "Memory foam" pillow I bought at a department store. The ComfiLife is firm, but not rigid. I place it just above the knees, and go right to sleep. I don't have to constantly re-position it to get comfortable. I wish everything in life worked that well, including my joints, lol.
customer_reviews.author: G. D. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Foam Collapses After Use
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this pillow, hoping it would be more convenient and comfortable than using a standard bed pillow. It’s not. After just six weeks of use, the center collapses to about an inch when using it. I thought its purpose was to provide more support than that and, though it’s better than nothing, “nothing” is not the standard to use. Any good reviews about this pillow had to be when first used, not after consistent use. PS - I am of average weight.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar pillow before which was an As Seen on TV brand which I got from Bed Bath & Beyond and this one is way better. The old one I had would sink too much so it was almost like I wasn't using a pillow at all. This one keeps it's shape throughout the night while also remaining soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my wife as she was starting to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife as she was starting to eye my old knee pillow with envy. When this one arrived, she initially complained that it was too hard... which thrilled me, because I immediately offered to give her my old one and use hers instead. I reluctantly pointed out that such is the nature of memory foam, and you need to give it a few seconds to compress in all the right places. She now loves this little pillow and uses it every night. I guess I'll have to order a new one for myself, darn it. I wouldn't mind seeing a higher quality cover, but I think it will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I want to like it...
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this pillow, but I dont. Its really soft and comfortable, but its just not long enough. I roll around in my sleep and when i used the regular head pillow it stayed in between my legs as i moved under the covers. This pillow did not move with me, if i rolled over during the night i would have to readjust it. Doing that several times a night instead of sleeping soundly is kind of not worth it. If i stayed in one spot I'm sure it would be fine, but thats not me. Therefore, the pillow just doesnt work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cora B.

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow, outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I am 7 months pregnant and hoped this knee pillow would alleviate some of the hip and back pain I am having. It is excellent quality, but it compresses too much to help with my pain. I emailed ComfiLife customer service and they responded within 2 hours and gave me a full refund and told me to keep the pillow. Awesome company!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Great Orthopedic Knee Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the ComfiLife Orthopedic Knee Pillow for over a week now. I really like the design and the material. I have never really used a knee pillow before. If I needed one I just used a regular head pillow. After having back surgery it was recommended that I purchase a knee pillow. I looked for one that was reasonably priced and that had good reviews. This ComfiLife Knee Pillow was one of the first ones I looked at. This has been a great purchase. It doesn’t seem to retain very much heat, which is a plus for me. Stays in place throughout the night. I love this Knee Pillow I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it for everything but what it’s intended for.
customer_reviews.text: It cracks me up that this pillow is so good at everything except what the manufacturer says it’s for. It’s just too soft for my preference to be used between the legs/knees on my side. BUT! I kept it anyway because it makes a wonderful head rest, foot rest, lower back support, phone holder, and laptop pad.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: If you don't move while sleeping it may work....
customer_reviews.text: This review is not an attempt to persuade or dissuade anyone. I've had this product over 1 month and I've only used it 4 times. Of those 4 times, I found the pillow either some where else underneath my blanket or on the floor. I'm not a heavy sleeper and I do sleep on my side, but I also sleep on my back too. Unless you sleep in one position do I think you'll benefit from this product. It is comfortable, but it's not as breathable, so it can get a bit hot. If your legs are weak it can get awkward at first because of how wide the pillow is even with the leg dip in the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose but materials aren’t great
customer_reviews.text: While I did like this pillow, the quality of the materials isn’t great. Don’t get me wrong it serves the purpose of more comfortable sleep for side sleepers like myself. However, with a little over a week of use the pillowcase turn grainy (see picture). For me it isn’t a great deal, yet is a bit annoying. Update Feb-2020 After a few months of using this product every night, it is now officially flatten out to the point it no longer serves its purpose. I have changed my rating to two starts and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but memory foam doesn’t give the support I need.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made cushion. The cover is removable and can be washed separately. I bought this pillow to use supporting my legs to keep them from touching while I sleep on my side in an effort to alleviate back pain. At the outset, it gave good support, but throughout the night, the memory foam collapsed from my body heat and my knees ended up touching again. I can see that this cushion would provide good support for one leg, but it did not perform the way I had intended to use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Magalee

customer_reviews.title: Supreme Waste of Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This product was more uncomfortable than the sore back I was trying to cure! Made of rigid form that simply will not conform, it is an unwieldy 5" thick and 10" long. No placement was comfortable for either 5'2" me or my 6'2" partner. I can't imagine a body type for whom would be comfortable as thickness forces legs into a V position, making side sleeping painful on ankles. Bought two; one still in plastic. Missed the return window so donating to Goodwill. Worst product ever purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Marie Pontello

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Your knee pillow has lived up to the description offered when first purchased. Sleep was so comfortable with it that I immediately ordered a second one for a vacation house so as not to be without this sleep aid. In addition to being able to sleep really well, another of the best things about it is that as opposed to a regular pillow that had to be rearranged when turning over, this knee pillow stays in place and I don't disturb my sleeping partner! Your knee pillow is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't get memory foam. It flattens as you apply pressure, so... this becomes flat. But expands back when you're done using it. I don't need it to go flat. User error? Sure. Im a tiny human as well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: Life changer. I have had a broken back for most of my life, and had just gotten used to pain being a part of my daily life. After ONE night with this pillow, my opinion was drastically changed. Sciatic nerve pain constantly radiated into my lower extremities, even on "good days". That stopped on day 2 of owning this pillow. I won't claim to understand how it helped, but I will never sleep without one of these pillows again. Thanks to what it has done, I can now be more physically active, further improving my health. Well done, ComfiLife!
customer_reviews.author: Landon Moses

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and wide
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4 and 120lbs and this pillow was not way to wide. It put my knees so far apart i ended up having more back and hip pain after using it. So i gave it to my husband who is 6’4 and 230lbs and this pillow was bad for him too. Don’t purchase. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I have scoliosis, a mild case but it still causes a ton of back pain. I feel like maybe the measurements on mine were off or it's just not thick enough, I might as well just use a couple of regular pillows. I'm really disappointed, especially with such high reviews. It may work for some but for me it didn't. I also don't think it was firm enough to keep the gap between my legs the way they should be and I'm not a big girl I'm 5"1" and 125lbs so it should have been able to keep my legs separated not sunk down back together. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danika Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay still
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect this thing to be in between your legs when you wake up if it had a elastic strap attached with velcro this would be perfect. Also it has two really long tags that I'm worried about cutting because if it's not a perfect cut it will dig into my skin. With that being said it is a good thickness and the material used is nice I might just attach a soft elastic strap myself to make it easier to use. Because it doesn't stay between the legs well it has yet to improve my sleep but I'm hoping the strap will help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalyn

customer_reviews.title: Who knew that this pillow is beyond awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for a Christmas present. He always sleeps with a pillow between his knees because he always wakes up in the night because his knees always hurt... He absolutely loves loves this pillow! Works wonders on his knees!! Now from the person who cleans this thing..it has a cover over the foam but it fits really snug..it needs a bit bigger case to put on it so it's easier to take on and off for washing the case..even with issue I will be a repeat customer because it just works so well!!!
customer_reviews.author: April M. Janzen

customer_reviews.title: Seems to definitely keep my spine aligned while I sleep
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hip bursitis after the doctor told me to put a pillow between my legs when I sleep. Did a bit of research as to why and I discovered this and other brands. Decided to give it a try and I used it last night for first time and I couldn't believe how much better my hip and back felt when I got up this morning. I'm 200 lbs and was concerned that it may not be big enough but it fits perfect. Based on last night, I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MickyD

customer_reviews.title: Used this for pregnancy hip/pelvic pain
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow for most of my pregnancy. This was my fourth pregnancy and I had always used those huge body pillows. I wish I had this for all of the last ones. It’s nice that it doesn’t take up a ton of space in bed and the foam always bounces back. It gave just the right amount of support that I didn’t have the hip/pelvic pain or stiffness when I would get up to go to the bathroom at night and was easy to switch from one side to another. I would even use this after pregnancy for proper spine alignment while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Terryl

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I used to stuff blankets or regular pillows between my legs each night for relief. Finally I bit the bullet and decided to purchase a pillow specifically made for this. Now I can't imagine a night without using this pillow. The shape is everything and makes a big difference. It's very soft and comfortable. What else can I say? I'm very pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend it! For reference I'm a 5'5 120 lb woman.
customer_reviews.author: BorntoRun

customer_reviews.title: So much relief for my hip and sciatica pain
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical. I use big body pillows for comfort. The reviews are what sold me. I figured I'd try it. I can say it definitely works. My hip and sciatica pain are just about non existent. I thought it would be akward transition rolling over, but it's shockingly not. There are so many ways to use this pillow. I use it between the thighs, calves or with one leg resting on it while sleeping partially on my stomach. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: R. WeikertTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No More Pillow Between My Knees!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a pillow between my knees while I slept, but that meant I would have to readjust it every time I turned over. The ComfiLife Orthopedic Knee Pillow simply stays in place, doing its job, without any readjusting. It's totally comfortable and efficient. I do not have sciatica, but I am 75 years old and need a bit of help to be really comfortable while sleeping. This does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Clausen

customer_reviews.title: Way to big for a smaller person
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is waaaaaaaay to large to sleep with in between your knees. It did not put my body in a natural alignment at all! My legs were at a complete wide angle that was not comfortable. This did not conform to my body at all, it was so uncomfortable. Maybe it works for people that are giant, not a petite 5'3" woman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I get the best sleep while using this pillow. I used it for a couple of nights and, even though I move a lot, I managed to find it in my sleep and put it back between my thighs. It's thick and it feels like it won't be comfy, but memory foam will adjust and lose that shape easily. So I'm glad I went with this brand and not the other ones that offer a slim one. Overall I do recommend 100% if you're a side sleeper
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Ivette Padilla Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Really great investment
customer_reviews.text: I now have fewer and less severe backaches upon awakening. I had one sent to my brother in California, and an aunt who lives a distance from me. We all agree that we love this pillow for many reasons. It has a breathable cover that can be removed for washing, it does not make you hot, it is made of memory foam, etc. I would definitely reorder - or place a new order for any of my other family members that might want to try it out. Also, all of the pillows arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brig

customer_reviews.title: not good if you toss and turn
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who has hip pain, low back pain, or sciatica, knows that they cannot lie in one position all night. The product is fine until you have to roll over. Then, you have to reach down, remove, and replace in new position. If you were not fully awake on the roll over, you will surely be fully awake after you readjust this product several times through the night. I would not recommend if you roll over several times through the night. It actually becomes a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Really helps!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow hoping it would help my back to feel better in the morning. I could hardly stand when I got up during the night and in the morning. I was skeptical but needed something! It took a couple of nights to get used to it, but now I can't sleep without it! My husband tried it last night, and I just ordered a second one for him. The ComfiLife Orthopedic Knee Pillow we have now is MINE, MINE, MINE and I don't want to share!
customer_reviews.author: Bamajhh

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my hip pain 🙏 - just careful with zipper
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier I found this pillow! I’m in my second trimester and have a side sleeper but for weeks had horrible hip pain! The first night with this pillow and I’m 100% pain free! I was worried this pillow would be a little too thick since I’m on the shorter/smaller side but it’s perfect. I can even fake sleep on my stomach by leaning on side sleeper and propping one leg up. The ONLY negative- the pillowcase is super tight around the pillow and I cut my thumb open on the zipper getting it in& out to initially wash it. I know... who cuts themselves on a pillow 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: sent it back
customer_reviews.text: made my legs and back hurt, could not sleep too small
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: I have slept with a pillow between my legs for years. Lately, I have been having a little lower back pain in the mornings. Decided to give this a try. I found it to be very uncomfortable. In fact, it kinda hurt. It might be great for some people, but it was a little to "thick" for me. When my upper leg rested on it, it felt like it was restricting blood flow. Ended up going back to my trusty pillow.
customer_reviews.author: T.Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Might as well sleep with a slice of bread between your legs
customer_reviews.text: This thing went flat quickly after I started using it. I’m talking like two weeks. I have a memory foam mattress in my home and whatever is in here sure isn’t “memory foam”.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Laack

customer_reviews.title: HAVE TO ADJUST TO IT
customer_reviews.text: I have only this knee/hip pillow for a week or so. Was told to get one by my ortho surgeon because I have hip surgery coming up the end of October. I haven't made it through an entire night yet with this pillow. For me, it is not comfortable yet. I am supposed to place it between my knees to practice sleeping on my "good side" after the surgery. While I totally understand why he wants me to use this, it is a good thing I purchased it now because it will likely take me until the end of Oct. to adjust to it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Z.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I've had hip pain and sciatica since I had children. I can only go to sleep on my side, so when I realized I was hurting myself overnight, I worried that I wouldn't sleep well on my stomach or back. I heard about a knee pillow to relieve the pressure. This pillow is very supportive - it doesn't squash between my legs and go flat. I didn't notice a strong odor when I removed it from the packaging (some reviews said it smells). I do think the zipper opening could be slightly larger on the cover so it's easier to remove for washing. The cover is high-quality, as well. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s true! It works!
customer_reviews.text: Before the nerve and disc pain was so great I couldn’t walk when getting out of bed. A friend suggested this and at the time I thought, “You don’t get how much pain I’m in! There is no way a little pillow between my legs will help - No Way!” Well, I was so wrong! This little pillow helps a lot. I am able to get up in the morning and bend over to make my bed! Couldn’t do that before. Only problem is sometimes I kick it out during my sleep (cause I’m actually sleeping!) and I can’t get up easily. So I lay with the pillow between my thighs for 20-30 minutes and I’m good to go! Miraculous!
customer_reviews.author: d raquepo

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag of star ratings
customer_reviews.text: Overall: 3 stars because it didn't work for me. Pain relief: actually increased hip pain, waking me several times at night. Support: excellent because the foam is so dense. I can see why it works for most people, but I'm a petite woman (5'1" and 105#). The pillow kept my knees too far apart so actually forced my upper leg up and misaligned my hips. Again, good quality and I think would work well for others.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Made well, but it doesn't relieve pain
customer_reviews.text: Made wel but it did not relieve my back pain; mainly due to the size of the pillow. It added to my level of discomfort. The product is quality made with good materials but it is too big and hard to be comfortable. It's like sleeping with a big log between your knees. I tried it and my wife also tried it with the same conclusive observation of the product. The inner foam pillow does not compress and it quickly becomes uncomfortable. It would probably be better if it had a smaller profile other than a big non-compressing block of hard foam. This is an honest review, save yourself the return time and take a pass on this product.
customer_reviews.author: CWStew

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is the best thing I've tried to keep my back in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is the best thing I've tried to keep my back in the right position while I sleep. I have sciatica caused by lumbar stenosis and found that trying to find a comfortable position for sleeping was nearly impossible before I got this pillow. It took me a couple of nights to get used to it but I now find it extremely comfortable. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Arnott

customer_reviews.title: Relieved Hip Pain
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper and would frequently get hip pain at night. Since using this knee pillow, I have noticed a significant reduction in the frequency and severity of the hip pain. This pillow helps me sleep with better posture and hips aligned. I used to use a flat pillow, but this knee pillow is better because it keep my legs and hips in place. I originally thought the pain was from a firm mattress, so I changed to a soft foam mattress but still got the pain. This pillow is the thing that has worked consistently for me. Definitely worth a try if you are getting hip pain.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the product itself. It is actually very well made, and very comfy. I just did not anticipate how annoying this could be during the night for someone who is an "active" sleeper like myself. I move around a lot and sometimes it is a pain to have to readjust. But for the time that I am still, and on my side, this works very well. I think it helps regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was great at first and helped relieve my lower back pain, however I’m disappointed that for the price now 5 months later it is completely flattened out and I cannot return. For the money, I was expecting it to remain firm for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Helps if your a side sleeper to support hip and cushion knees
customer_reviews.text: I’m having a hip joint replaced in two months and was using a pillow before buying this. I sleep on my side and this helps relive pain until my surgery. It has a removable cover for washing which is nice. Update...after using for 3 months I like it. It has held up well and foam quality appears good. I still rate with a 3 star only because it is a little difficult to remove the cover for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective, impossible to replace foam in cover
customer_reviews.text: Looking for relief from hip arthritis pain for joint replacement surgery I tried this knee pillow as an alternative to various pillows I had been using. It's nicely compact. But it doesn't allow for any variation in the positioning of your legs when sleeping and it doesn't really hold your legs that far apart so the effect was minimal. A small pillow was actually much more effective and adjustable. In addition, the first time I removed the cover to wash it it immediately tore and the zipper ripped when trying to replace the foam in the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a regular pillow between my knees for years and decided to give this one a try. I'm very happy I did. From the first night with the pillow I've been sleeping so much better. It's also much easier to turn over with this pillow. I do wish the cover was cotton as the pillow gets hot during the night. That may be because of the foam and not the cover though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Richards

customer_reviews.title: No Go with this one
customer_reviews.text: While it is made well, I find it too small ..or rather not deep and curved and it falls away every time. I had one once that was perfect and someone made off with it. Finding the right replacement has been a nightmare..the quest continues :(
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow, case pilled up though
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pillow for me. I'm 5'6" and it provides me with a good amount of support and stays between my legs pretty well. The only issue I have with it is that the cover pilled up really quickly, which makes it kinda itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Much better than using a pillow between my knees. It does not get hot, stays in place, and it works! I have hip, knee, and back problems. The only way I can lay on my side is if I have a pillow between my knees, and that gets hot and does not stay in place. This knee pillow stays in place (for me anyway), does not get hot, and keeps my legs in the proper position so I do not wake up in pain. This is very comfortable and does not squish down from the weight of my leg, like some knee pillows I have reviewed. I weight 142 pounds and this is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Best knee pillow I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Thick, well made and worth the money. I'm a bigger gentleman and this fits me perfectly without squishing the life out of it. I'm able to sleep in one position all night now because my back isn't hurting and my hips are no longer rotating over. Wonderful product at an even better price.
customer_reviews.author: Shabba

customer_reviews.title: seems great but not what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: i give it 3 starts because it looks like a great product, its comfortable, material is soft but it just didnt work for me personally, i was looking for something very thick, similar to a pregnancy pillow, this is thin between the thights and i could see why it would help people but its just not my preference
customer_reviews.author: Juju221

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves the pillow to ease discomfort while sleeping and although not super thrilled with the zipper and seam breaking so quickly
customer_reviews.text: So this pillow is for my wife during her pregnancy. Within the first couple of days, the zipper popped off and the seam split. Still usable but washing the cover would be impossible. I e-mailed the company to let them know the issue. A few days later, we unexpectedly got a replacement pillow in the mail and saw that they had emailed me apologizing for the inconvenience. My wife loves the pillow to ease discomfort while sleeping and although not super thrilled with the zipper and seam breaking so quickly, the great customer service can't be denied. Their quick response and replacement was great and my wife is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: brock

customer_reviews.title: So Far I Like
customer_reviews.text: I have been through numerous "regular" pillows trying to find something I liked since I have had to start sleeping on my side due to getting a CPAP. I was concerned that this maybe was too small or wouldn't give enough support. I have been sleeping with it for two weeks now and am quite happy. It works for upper or lower leg positions and even when you don't put it in between and only use it to support one leg to the side. It isn't too hot and is firm enough to give great support but soft enough to not be uncomfortable. Back feels great and I am sleeping well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this is just incompatible with my body. It may work fine for someone else. The amount of a gap that this created ended up causing more pain for me. Often found it on the floor in the morning because I couldn't get comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vē

customer_reviews.title: Three stars
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this pillow just wasn't for me? I've had this pillow for a couple of weeks now and done find it as comfortable as I would have liked. I sleep on my side, knees slight bent, and I prefer to have a little support between my knees. Because the way this pillow was designed I found it difficult to situate it been my knees. The pillow would work better if I placed it above or below my knees but personally it's not comfortable in those spots for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K.

customer_reviews.title: I seriously love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing EVER! I'm a side sleeper and have always had terrible back pain. I used to sleep with a standard pillow between my legs at night, but it was always taking up space in our queen bed and I would lose it through the night, not to mention still waking with awful back pain. I decided to try this pillow based on reviews and I'm so glad I did! It was a life saver when I was pregnant, and still is. It's amazing how much this pillow alone has reduced my back pain! Its comfortable to use, and it somehow stays with me through the night. I highly recommend giving this pillow a try!
customer_reviews.author: JessE23

customer_reviews.title: ... strap to keep it on your leg but I'm glad I got this one instead
customer_reviews.text: I researched the pillows and almost bought one with a strap to keep it on your leg but I'm glad I got this one instead. VERY comfortable to use and it doesn't fall out while sleeping. After using it for a month I feel improvement in my low back, thigh and hip pain. I move around a lot while sleeping and it is very easy to switch the pillow from side to side. It doesn't swish down like cheap memory foam either, it keeps a good shape not too hard and not too too soft but very comfortable. Highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Pillow. Great Customer Support.
customer_reviews.text: I love my knee pillow. I also bought one for my husband. I use it every night. I have used it while pregnant and postpartum. It offers great support. I had an issue with my pillow flattening and they sent me a replacement pillow right away. Responsive and helpful customer service. The cover has pilled over time but I am very satisfied with the support. Sometimes it does get a little warm while using it. Overall a great knee pillow.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: ComfiLife Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my ComfiLife Pillow...it helps a lot with the siatic and lower pain in my back. It stays in place through out the night as well. Much better than a standard pillow. Now all I need to do is find the right pillow for my neck! :) I've tried two different kind for my neck pain... but I haven't found the right one yet! I give ComfiLife 5 stars for quality as well. If you suffer with siatic and lower back pain, you may want to try this pillow. No regrets here! I purchased two, one for myself and one for my husband...he loves his also! :) Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: S.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone to test.
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to give one of these a try to help with back pain. I've definitely noticed a difference and it is much more comfortable. If you forget to use it at night you will feel it when you wake up. Could maybe be a little firmer, but hold it's shape well. For the price it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Side sleeping changed forever
customer_reviews.text: I always start to fall asleep on my back but end up stirring in the middle of the night to move on to either side. If I don't adjust to my back again, I wake up with a sore lower back, sensitive hips, and achy knees. This knee pillow has revolutionized my sleep quality! The first night I used it, I immediately could feel the difference in my body when I fell asleep, and when I woke up! After a few weeks of use, I wake up feeling more rested and energized with the ability to hop right out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: DSilver

customer_reviews.title: PILLOW WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: My knee pillow was flattening and I was experiencing severe hip pain during the night and next day. Concluding that my pillow wasn’t suitable, I bought this one. From night 1, I slept better with no hip pain the next day. After about a week, this pillow is still working and I don’t need pain pills. Awesome pillow for my specific hip/knee problem.
customer_reviews.author: Janis M

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and much less achiness in the morning!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very nice with pregnancy related sleep discomfort. I pair it with a belly wedge and wake up much less achy than I used to! Wish I'd looked into one for past pregnancies! I'm 5'6'' and this pillow just above my knees keeps my hips in a nice, comfortable alignment!
customer_reviews.author: J. Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: If it was bigger it would be better.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is right, but I find myself using a firm pillow instead as this is too small to really feel useful. If it covered 3 times the area it does now when you put it between your legs it would be much better. My legs do the seesaw with how small it is right now. I am not able to recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: ViceP

customer_reviews.title: 6 months of using...
customer_reviews.text: This product and I have noticed an extreme difference in my wife and I's back pain relief. This product, if used, all the time will help you back pain. My wife had pain all the time and since she has used this product her pain has gone away and helped with her sleeping at night. I don't know the science behind it but it has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Questriot

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is saving my knees and body
customer_reviews.text: My knees are so grateful for this pillow. I had been in so much pain every day I hobbled through the day. I tried sleeping with a regular pillow between my knees but that did nothing to help the daily pain. I saw this come up on a suggestion from amazon and decided to give it a try. I would say my daily knee pain has been reduced by 75%. The only downside for me is when I roll over at night and the pillow becomes dislodged. It wakes me up and I have to readjust. The pain relief by far outweighs the waking up at night.
customer_reviews.author: Susieever

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS MY KEY TO COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: This knee pillow is what I’ve been needing for so long! It takes far less time to go to sleep, and I sleep pain-free. I’m beginning to see a reduction in my daily pain, and I’m so happy about that. The quality of this pillow is top-notch, and I love that the cover comes off and is washable. I just ordered a cushion on which to sit in hopes that it, too, will be be of benefit to me. I will always look to ComfiLife for my orthopedic comfort needs. I recommend this knee pillow to everyone whether or not you’re suffering for pain. Using it aligns the back for healthful sleep.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from lower back pain due to a herniated disc and now pregnant with my second child, which has only increased my back pain. This pillow has been a life changer!! It has significantly helped with my sciatic pains and achieve a comfortable sleeping position (well, as comfortable as you can be when pregnant lol). I wish I would have known about this pillow sooner even pre second pregnancy! I will continue to use even after I give birth just to help support my lower back and reduce discomfort associated with my back issues. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amaris Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Really help with my upper leg and hip pain.
customer_reviews.text: Being a side sleeper I began having upper leg and hip pain on one side. Decided to order this and give it a try. It definitely reduced my leg and hip pain from it's first use. It did take me about a week to get use to using this and pillow was quite stiff the first few nights but after a week I'm now very comfortable in using knee pillow and very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Stetson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received my pillow about a week ago. I’m overall happy with my purchase. The material is great, it’s very well made and arrived promptly. I still can’t write a full review of my experience using the pillow. It’s only been a week and haven’t felt any improvement sleeping. My back still hurts a lot sleeping and walking or standing. I have a doctors’ appointment in a couple of days, hopefully with proper treatment and using the pillow I’ll feel a bit of relief in a couple of months. P.S. I have a pinched nerve and sciatica pain caused by three herniated disks.
customer_reviews.author: V. Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Ok pillow, but not great durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knee pillow back in late 2017 and have used it consistently since purchas. The pillow wasn’t the sturdiest of quality for relieving lower back pain, but it worked. Sleep quality was better and my back was better aligned. Durability is not great with the pillow though. 2.5 years later and the center of the pillow is squished and doesn’t provide support anymore. Worked ok for about 2 of those years, but I’m looking for another product with a little more longevity now.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: WAY bigger help than I even thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow because I've been having really bad back pain when I wake up in the morning (even despite having a mattress less than a year old). I didn't really think it would help all that much but thought it certainly couldn't hurt, so why not? It's amazing. I'm seriously SO surprised at how much this has helped with my back pain. I wake up of a morning and my back is actually ok... I don't have to sit on the edge of the bed and brace myself before I get up anymore. I love this pillow so much. I'm definitely going to keep using this and highly highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Started off good...
customer_reviews.text: The initial usage of the pillow was great, but loses support and gets soft after only a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: HCShowtime19daCritic

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing customer sesrvice experience!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product recently and after a while determined that it was too thick for me and that the space between my knees while sleeping caused discomfort. I went back to an older one, from a different manufacturer and the problem was resolved. I wrote an email to the company, ComfiLife, and received a very polite email the next day, and was given a full refund. I wish that they made a pillow that had smaller height/loft as I would buy it. The cover was comfortable and it was well made. So even though it did not work well for me, I was quite impressed with my customer service experience.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Large
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this pillow because it was too wide to comfortably fit between my knees. I'm petite, but I used the pillow between my knees for almost 2 weeks and the memory foam still did not 'mold' or compress to my body shape. I felt like instead of my making my knees an equal width apart in relation to my hips, it made them too wide which was uncomfortable throughout the night. I also had issues keeping it between my knees if I switched sides while sleeping. I wish it would've worked!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write reviews, but I am heavily dependent on reviews. I am in my last month of pregnancy and I have had Symphysis pubis dysfunction since about month 7. I have been putting a pillow between my legs to deal with the pain, but it is not enough! I decided to purchase this to help ease the pain in the middle of the night and in the morning. It has helped tremendously so far! I do not wake up with pain anymore. So happy I purchased this! One thing to note, it is a little bit firm (for good reason though). I just put a pillow case over it to keep it clean!
customer_reviews.author: brittney

customer_reviews.title: So comfy, so effective
customer_reviews.text: For the past year I’ve been having lower back issues and hip aches. I’ve gotten monthly massage therapy and had my back adjusted a few times. I’m not a heavy sleeper so anytime my body aches, I’ll toss and turn all night. Someone at work told me about this pillow that helped his wife with similar aches and I figured it’s worth a shot. To my surprise, the pillow takes off a lot of pressure and strain off my hips and lower back when I sleep on my side. I toss and turn far less at night and have less tension and aches throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is everything that was promised with good quality and design
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is everything that was promised with good quality and design, however, for my body build with heavy legs I find that the shortness of the pillow at the knee level tended to cause undue pressure at the edges into the bottom leg. I felt for me I would probably do better with a longer support down the leg that would disseminate the pressure yet maintain alignment of my upper thigh and leg.. Again, I have no complaints with the construction, qualitiy and design of the pillow received.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo G..

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable but did not help sciatica
customer_reviews.text: I have sciatica in my left leg from a herniated disk in my L5 S1. I prefer to sleep on my side but cannot do so without pain in my hip and leg. I was hopeful from reading reviews that this would help but unfortunately it did not make a difference in my comfort or ability to not be in pain. The product itself seems well made, comfortable and supportive. Unfortunately for me it didn’t work but maybe for some it will.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Not firm enough
customer_reviews.text: The shape and weight and size of this pillow is perfect! It really aligns your hips and is very comfortable. However, that only works for 5 minutes or so until the foam adjusts to your body heat and becomes nearly flat. Super disappointing, you'd think it would be a firmer foam.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely helped my back and especially my hip area where I have had trouble with ligaments holding my hip in place. Loose joint syndrome allows my joints to slip slighty when sleeping and I wake up with some pain in elbows and hip joints. This pillow has helped this and is smaller so my husband doesn't have a big pillow flopping around under the covers. I had to get used to it for maybe 2 nights, now it feels natural.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Side sleepers due to Sleep Apnea - this will help
customer_reviews.text: My snoring due to Sleep Apnea is minimized if I sleep on my side. I was reluctant to use this knee pillow at first, but it truly ensures my hips stay in the right position and more more still hips in the morning. Doesn't look super cool, but it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T. Prior

customer_reviews.title: Better alignment than a regular pillow for your knees.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for issues with lower back and hip pain. I had previously been using a regular pillow for a knee pillow and thought that should be ok. Once trying this pillow I immediately noticed the difference in alignment from a regular pillow. So much better!!! It stays put pretty well during the night unless you are a very active sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: A sound knee pillow for my average frame
customer_reviews.text: This is a sound knee pillow, and significantly better that the rectangular pillow I had become accustomed to over the last several years. I'm 5'10 and 160 pounds so this fits very well with my frame, but I can imagine if you were much bigger this would lose some application. Irrespective, it took a week to adjust to it, but now I am relatively enamored with it and use it evert time I sleep, or even read in bed. It's easy to get in a good comfy place and I enjoy the softness. I think it could be just slightly wider to encompass a bit more of my leg, but all-in-all, a very quality product.
customer_reviews.author: notyou123
